title: Metropol
description: (without title) and 9 pages of alternative covers and sketchbooks. "APOCALYPSE HAS BEGUN" Yet salvation is here as the angels who watch come to fight the hordes of hell and protect mankind. Complete Volume Information: This collected edition in 5 black and white volumes contains the director's cut of Metropol and Metropol AD plus pages from Ted Mckeever's sketchbooks.
author: Ted McKeever
